chatbot.welcomeMessage: Welcome to Powerton Engineering! How can I help you today?

responses.products: We offer a comprehensive range of industrial automation products, electrical components, instrumentation, solar systems, and more. What specific products are you looking for?
responses.services: Our services include installation, maintenance, calibration, technical support, and custom solutions. Which service interests you?
responses.contact: You can reach us at +91-94627-71662 or email us at info@powertonengineering.com. Our headquarters is located in Noida, India, and we serve clients worldwide.
responses.quote: I'd be happy to help you get a quote! Please visit our quote page or provide me with your requirements.
responses.support: Our technical support team is here to help! Please describe your technical question or issue.
responses.productSelection: Great! We have a wide range of industrial products across multiple categories. Which category interests you most?
responses.serviceSelection: We provide comprehensive engineering services to support your projects from start to finish. Which service can we help you with?
responses.troubleshootingMain: I'm here to help you troubleshoot your technical issues. What type of problem are you experiencing?
responses.companyInfo: Powerton Engineering is a leading industrial automation and electrical engineering company with 15+ years of experience. We serve clients worldwide with comprehensive solutions.
responses.electricalCategory: We supply comprehensive electrical components for industrial applications including power distribution, control, and protection equipment. What electrical components do you need?
responses.automationCategory: Our automation solutions include PLCs, SCADA, DCS, and HMI systems for complete industrial control. What automation challenge can we solve for you?
responses.solarCategory: We provide complete solar solutions from panels to installation and maintenance. What solar project are you planning?
responses.safetyCategory: Safety is paramount in industrial applications. We offer a full range of protection and safety equipment. What safety equipment do you need?
responses.installationService: Our expert installation teams ensure proper setup and commissioning of your industrial systems. What equipment needs installation?
responses.electricalTroubleshooting: I can help diagnose electrical issues. Common problems include power supply failures, circuit protection trips, and grounding issues. What symptoms are you experiencing?
responses.sensorTroubleshooting: Sensor issues can affect measurement accuracy. Common problems include calibration drift, signal interference, and environmental factors. What sensor problem are you facing?
responses.automationSearch: I can help you find the perfect automation solution! Our range includes PLCs, SCADA systems, HMI interfaces, and complete control packages.
responses.solarSearch: Excellent! Our solar solutions include complete system design, installation, and maintenance services for residential, commercial, and industrial applications.
responses.mechanicalSearch: Great choice! We offer a comprehensive range of motors, pumps, valves, and mechanical equipment for various industrial applications.
responses.serviceSearch: Perfect! Our service offerings include calibration, maintenance programs, emergency support, and comprehensive training solutions.
responses.contactSearch: Here are all the ways to reach us! We're available through multiple channels for your convenience.
responses.powerSupplyHelp: Power supply issues can be critical. Common problems include voltage fluctuations, overloading, harmonic distortion, and component failures. Let me help you find the right solution.
responses.temperatureSensorHelp: Temperature measurement accuracy is crucial for process control. Issues often involve calibration drift, environmental interference, or sensor aging. Here's how we can help.
responses.plcTroubleshooting: PLC issues can halt production. Common problems include programming errors, I/O failures, communication faults, and power supply issues. Let's get your system back online.
responses.solarPerformanceHelp: Solar system performance issues can significantly impact energy generation. Common causes include inverter faults, panel degradation, shading, and monitoring system failures.

chatbotMessages.quoteHelp: I'd be happy to help you get a customized quote! Our pricing is competitive and transparent. For accurate pricing, we'll need to understand your specific requirements. Let's connect you with our sales team for a detailed discussion.
chatbotMessages.helpAssist: I'm here to help you every step of the way! Whether you need product selection guidance, technical specifications, service support, or just want to learn more about our company, I'm at your service. What would you like assistance with?
chatbotMessages.businessHoursInfo: We're here when you need us! Our business hours are Monday to Saturday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM. We also provide emergency support on Sundays for critical situations. Located in Noida, Sector 6, F-25, F Block (nearest metro: Sector 15).
chatbotMessages.pricingInfo: Our pricing is always competitive and transparent! We believe in providing value for money with no hidden costs. Pricing depends on specifications, quantity, and project scope. For the most accurate quote, our team will assess your specific requirements.
chatbotMessages.achievements: We're proud of our achievements! Over 500+ successful projects completed, 50+ major clients served, 15+ years of experience, and partnerships with industry leaders like Thermax, Motherson, and Praj Industries. Our 10MW solar plant project and pharmaceutical automation systems are among our flagship achievements.
chatbotMessages.mainMenu: Welcome back to the main menu! I'm here to help you with any industrial automation needs. Whether you're looking for products, services, technical support, or company information, I'll guide you to the right solution. What can I help you with?
chatbotMessages.urgentSupport: Urgent matters include: equipment failures affecting production, safety-critical issues, emergency breakdowns, installation deadlines, and system malfunctions. For these situations, call us immediately at +91-94627-71662. We provide 24/7 emergency support for critical situations.
chatbotMessages.productComparison: I can help you compare products! Our extensive range includes sensors, automation systems, electrical components, and solar products. Tell me which specific products you're comparing or what application you need them for, and I'll guide you to the best options.
chatbotMessages.quoteTips: Here are some tips for getting the best quote: 1) Provide detailed specifications and requirements, 2) Mention quantity needed, 3) Include project timeline, 4) Specify installation location, 5) List any special requirements or certifications needed. The more details you provide, the more accurate our quote will be!
chatbotMessages.defaultResponse: Thank you for reaching out! I'm here to help you find the perfect industrial automation solution. At Powerton Engineering, we believe every customer deserves personalized attention and expert guidance. What specific challenge or requirement can I help you with today?
chatbotMessages.productsPageResponse: Perfect! I've taken you to our products page where you can explore our extensive range of industrial automation solutions. You'll find detailed specifications, images, and technical data for each product category. Need help finding something specific or have questions about any product?
chatbotMessages.servicesPageResponse: Excellent choice! Our services page showcases our comprehensive support offerings from installation to maintenance. We're your complete engineering partner for the entire project lifecycle. What type of service support are you looking for?
chatbotMessages.contactPageResponse: Great! The contact page has all our details including office location, phone numbers, and contact form. We're based in Noida and available Monday-Saturday. Feel free to reach out anytime! Is there anything specific you'd like to discuss with our team?
chatbotMessages.aboutPageResponse: Wonderful! Our about page tells the complete story of Powerton Engineering - our journey, achievements, team, and values. With 15+ years of experience and 500+ successful projects, we're proud of our engineering excellence. Want to know more about any specific aspect?
chatbotMessages.projectsPageResponse: Fantastic! Our projects page showcases our portfolio of successful implementations across various industries. From 10MW solar plants to pharmaceutical automation systems, each project demonstrates our technical expertise. Interested in a similar project?
chatbotMessages.quotePageResponse: Perfect! Our quote page will help you get a detailed proposal tailored to your specific requirements. Our team will analyze your needs and provide competitive pricing with transparent terms. What type of solution are you looking to quote?
chatbotMessages.genericPageResponse: I've directed you to the requested page. You can find all the relevant information there. Feel free to explore and let me know if you need any assistance or have questions about what you find!
chatbotMessages.callInitiated: I've initiated the call for you! Our expert team is standing by to provide immediate assistance. If the call doesn't connect, you can also reach us via email or visit our office. How else can I help you today?
chatbotMessages.emailOpened: I've opened your email client with our address pre-filled! Please describe your requirements in detail, and our team will respond within 24 hours. For urgent matters, calling us directly is faster. What else can I assist you with?
chatbotMessages.externalResourceOpened: I've opened the external resource for you! You can explore the additional information there. When you're ready to continue our conversation or need further assistance, I'm here to help. What would you like to do next?
chatbotMessages.actionCompleted: Action completed! I'm here to continue assisting you with any questions or requirements you might have. What would you like to explore next?

welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm your Engineering Advisor. I'm here to help you find the right industrial automation solutions, answer technical questions, and guide you through our products and services. How can I assist you today?

responses.productSelection: Great choice! I can help you find the perfect products for your industrial automation needs. Which category interests you most?
responses.electricalCategory: Excellent! Our electrical components are designed for reliability and safety in industrial environments. Which type of electrical component are you looking for?
responses.automationCategory: Perfect! Our automation and control systems help streamline operations and improve efficiency. What type of automation solution do you need?
responses.solarCategory: Wonderful! Solar energy solutions are increasingly important for sustainable operations. What solar products are you interested in?
responses.electricalTroubleshooting: I'll help you diagnose electrical issues step by step. What specific electrical problem are you experiencing?
responses.sensorTroubleshooting: Sensor issues can affect measurement accuracy. Let me help you identify and resolve the problem. What type of sensor issue are you facing?
responses.controlTroubleshooting: Control system problems can impact your entire operation. I'll help you troubleshoot systematically. What control system issue are you experiencing?
responses.contactSearch: I'm happy to help you get in touch with our team! Here are the best ways to reach us:
responses.careerOptions: Join our team of innovative engineers and technical experts! We offer exciting career opportunities, professional growth, and a collaborative work environment. Explore our current openings or learn more about what it's like to work at Powerton Engineering.
